Author: lil_frogg0
Text: Take a few deep breaths... Leggings dont define you. Your kind heart and caring spirit defines you. Just try to have some water and take a nap maybe to feel better.  Then try to Do a little something later to treat yourself. It doesnt have to be food based. Buy a scented candle, do some art, go for a walk, listen to music, go for a drive, call a friend.   Feel better ðŸ’•
